sentences.en: Alex is too young to be already thinking of herself as an old maid.
sentences.cn: 亚历克丝认为自己是个老姑娘的想法还太早了点。

sentences.en: He tried to tidy up, not wanting the maid to see the disarray.
sentences.cn: 他试图收拾一下，不想让女佣看见那里乱七八糟。

sentences.en: Her hair was craped by her maid.
sentences.cn: 她的头发是她的女仆所卷的.

sentences.en: Her maid helped her to dress for the ball.
sentences.cn: 她的女仆帮她穿上参加舞会的晚礼服.

sentences.en: Her maid locked the case in the safe.
sentences.cn: 她的女佣把箱子锁进保险柜里。

sentences.en: I have sent my maid away.
sentences.cn: 我已把我的女仆解雇了.

sentences.en: I have turned off my maid.
I sent him a long fax, saying I didn't need a maid.
sentences.cn: 我给他发了一份很长的传真，说我不需要女仆。

sentences.en: In these early stories, there was no love interest from Maid Marion, no link to Richard I, no mention of the resistance versus the Norman Conquest.
sentences.cn: 这些早期的故事里，没有少女玛瑞恩的爱情，没有和理查一世的交往，也没有提到抵抗诺曼征服。

sentences.en: Once a week, a maid changes the sheets.
sentences.cn: 女仆每星期换一次床单。

sentences.en: She doubled as the maid and the secretary in the play.
sentences.cn: 她在这出剧里兼饰女佣和秘书.

sentences.en: The maid looked at him, a nervous smile on her face.
sentences.cn: 女服务员看着他，脸上带着一丝局促不安的微笑。

sentences.en: The maid plunged the cloth into the pail and cleaned the floor.
sentences.cn: 那个侍女把拖把放进桶里浸湿,用来擦地.

sentences.en: The maid went over the room quickly with a duster.
sentences.cn: 那个女仆用掸子很快地给房间掸尘.

sentences.en: The maid, casting black looks, hurried out.
sentences.cn: 女仆怒气冲冲地瞪了几眼，匆匆地出去了。

sentences.en: There is a maid to do the housework.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 老处女；[口]谨小慎微的人

trans.tran_cn: 女仆，侍女，少女，处女，未婚女子
trans.tran_en: a female servant, especially in a large house or hotel
